description: Ms. codex. Title provided by cataloger. 17 lines per page (Text 9: 25 lines per page). Written in medium small naskh(?) in black ink with use of red. Dark cream glazed European paper with watermark. Fol. 115-122 on a clearer glazed European paper with watermark, apparently from another hand. Foliation in black ink using Arabic numerals. Table of contents on fol. IIa. Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the upper cover: "Mujammaʻ 6". Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the pastedown of the upper cover: "504/2 Ḥāʼ". Copied by Khulūṣ Darwīsh Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥarram ibn Ḥasan Faqīh ibn Zafar Faqīh al-Junaydī(?) al-Ḥanafī al-Khilwatī al-Ṭūpkhānūʼī (fol. 5b, 6a, 13a, 26a, 28b, 33a, 36a, 38b, 43b, 64a, 71a, 94b, 102a, 114b). Copy of Text 1 completed on Yawm al-Jumʻah(?) 21 Muḥarram 1127 [January 27, 1715] (colophon, fol. 5b). Copy of Text 2 completed on Yawm al-Aḥad(?) 23 Muḥarram 1127 [January 29, 1715] (colophon, fol. 13a). Copy of Texts 3 and 4 completed on 6 Ṣafar 1127 [February 11, 1715] (colophons, fol. 26a and 28b). Copy of Text 5 completed on 8 Ṣafar 1127 [February 13, 1715] (colophon, fol. 33a). Copy of Texts 6 and 7 completed on 9 Ṣafar 1127 [February 14, 1715] (colophons, fol. 36a and 38b). Copy of Text 8 completed on 22 Shaʻbān 1132 [June 29, 1720] (colophon, fol. 43b). Copy of Text 9 completed on 6 Shawwāl 1134 [July 20, 1722] (colophon, fol. 54a). Copy of Text 10 started on Wednesday [10 Muḥarram] ("yawm ʻĀshūrá") 1127 [January 16, 1715] (title page, fol. 55a) and completed on 14 Muḥarram 1127 [January 20, 1715] (colophon, fol. 64a). Copy of Text 11 completed 26 Dhū al-Ḥijjah 1126 [January 2, 1715] (colophon, fol. 71a). Copy of Text 12 completed on Wednesday [10 Muḥarram] ("yawm ʻĀshūrá") 1127 [January 16, 1715] (colophon, fol. 94b). Copy of Text 13 completed on 17 Muḥarram 1127 [January 23, 1715] (colophon, fol. 102a). Copy of Text 14 completed on 20 Muḥarram 1127 [January 26, 1715] (colophon, fol. 114b). Often, the day of the week mentioned in the colophons does not seem to correspond to the date given. Collation: Paper, fol. ii, 122, ii ; ii (endleaves on glazed European paper with watermark, with table of contents on fol. IIa) + 1-4¹⁰ 5¹⁴ 6-11¹⁰ 12⁸ + ii ; catchword on the verso of each leaf.
author: Suyūṭī, 1445-1505
abstract: Collection of fifteen short treatises by al-Suyūṭī.
contents: 25. fol. 115b-122a (Text 15): Risālat al-amānī fī uṣūl al-tahānī / lil-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī [Title in Table of contents: "Kitāb Wuṣūl al-amānī bi-uṣūl al-tahānī"].
extent: ii, 122, ii leaves: paper ; 220 x 160 (160 x 105) mm. bound to 220 x 160 mm.
title: Kitāb al-asʼilah al-sabʻah ; Shadd al-athwāb fī sadd al-abwāb ... [etc.].
provenance: From the books of Aḥmad Najīb [19th cent.] (fol. IIa). Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: سيوطي
subject: Jesus Christ—Islamic interpretations—Early works to 1800
binding_note: Marbled paper pasted on stiffened brown leather for upper and lower covers. Yellow paper pastedowns.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
